attributes.action: Change the age limit of cervical smear tests to 18
attributes.additional_details: Please can every person sign it takes 2 minutes and get there friends to sign there boyfriends, girlfriends, mothers, children everyone! We need 10'000 signatures to get this petition heard!
attributes.background: So many in fact hundreds of young girls aged below 25 have sadly lost there life through having cervical cancer and not been diagnosed. This means them hundreds of woman there family have been torn apart, some children are having to grow up not knowing there mothers! We need to change this!!!
